page.description: Enumerate all file watches - format F=File/Path, N=Wwatch Name O=Option Flags.

argument.name: Format
argument.description: A list of watches set by the FILE.WATCH_CREATE() method.

page.discussion: The FILE.WATCH_ENUMERATE() method lists the "watches" set by the FILE.WATCH_CREATE() method.
page.example: file.watch_create("temp_dir", "c:\temp", "F", "my_alert_function()") ? file.watch_enumerate() = temp_dir c:\temp F file.watch_destroy("temp_dir")
